name: mikrotik-proxy-frontend
description: Frontend server for the Mikrotik Billling Management by AJC

scripts.preinstall:
command -v make >/dev/null 2>&1 || { echo >&2 '
[ERROR] Missing System Dependencies!
`make` command not found. This is required to build native Node.js modules.
Please run the following command to install the build tools:

  sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install -y build-essential
'; exit 1; }
